subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Different chip config.
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I've offered to help with this, at least with building. I can make PC boards
far cheaper than ExpressPCB.

The thing is, I don't know if Frank has a design he's happy with yet! If we
had that, making them in quantity wouldn't be a problem.

Zack

On Mon, Jun 1, 2009 at 7:01 AM, Elaine Coates <cozykat2003@...> wrote:

>
>
>  Maybe you could just ask for the schematic and get somebody else to build

> their radios.  That could get out of hand.

>>>

>>> the schematics with MS paint, and they are stored as jpeg images, which
>>> isn't the best, but it makes them e-mailable.

>>>> *Subject:* [EVP-ITC] Different chip config. [1 Attachment]
>>>>
>>>>   I think I followed an erroneous LM3820 layout, so I'm going to
>>>> breadboard this layout. Note the antenna input is now on pin 12-11, this is
>>>> the RF amp input, and pin 13 is the RF amp output, which feeds pin 1.
>>>>
>>>>  'case anyone cares.
>>>>
>>>>  F-S
>>>>
>>>>
>>>
